channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Keep Android Open
item.description:
In August 2025, Google announced that starting next year, it will no longer be possible to develop apps for the Android platform without first registering centrally with Google. Some actions you can take to help oppose the enactment of this policy are:.

Read more

item.title: Tips for stroke-surviving software engineers
item.description:
Use your employee assistance programs too. Spend your time more carefully than your money. I'm still working on this stuff.

Read more

item.title: Wacl – A Tcl Distribution for WebAssembly
item.description:
The code compiles fine with Emscripten 1. However, that could induce incompatibilities with older browsers, which don't (yet) support WebAssembly. There is a Makefile with the build steps and a README with instructione.

Read more
